alert.note: Alert for Jack; Palo Pinto; Parker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 2:59PM CDT until March 16 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JACK...NORTHWESTERN PARKER AND NORTHEASTERN PALO PINTO COUNTIES... At 259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Graford, or near Mineral Wells, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mineral Wells, Graford, Palo Pinto, Cool, Lake Mineral Wells, Millsap, Perrin, Adell, Advance, Salesville, Whitt, Gibtown, Joplin, Authon, Oran, Garner, Peadenville and Bennett. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. Move to a shelter, inside a strong building and stay away from windows. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
